document_data.caption: The River Caraguir flowing south across Dambrath.
document_data.name: River Caraguir
document_data.Geography: The River Caraguir originated in the [[Gnollwatch Mountains]], flowing south across Dambrath before emptying into the [[Bay of Dancing Dolphins]].
document_data.Notable locations: The city of [[Luenath]] was located on the west bank of the river.
